column2: TPG Capital looking to buy Cushman & Wakefield for $2 bln-Bloomberg WASHINGTON
column3: May 9 TPG Capital is in advanced discussions to buy commercial property brokerage Cushman & Wakefield Inc from Exor SpA for about $2 billion
column4: and an agreement could be announced as soon as next week
column6: citing people familiar with the matter. ~Goldman Sachs expected to settle forex suit for almost $130 mln - WSJ May 8 Goldman Sachs Group Inc is expected to pay $129.5 million to settle its portion of a lawsuit that accuses banks of rigging prices in the foreign exchange market
column8: citing a person familiar with the matter. ~

column2: U.S. jury clears HBO of libel in India child labor story NEW YORK A U.S. jury cleared HBO of libel claims on Friday in a lawsuit brought against the Time Warner Inc  subsidiary by a British sporting goods company over a report linking it to child labor in India. ~
